About Me

Hi, I am MJ, a Web Developer, and I recently worked for a Project Based - Web Developer. Within that period, I was exposed to a variety of tasks such as documentation, information gathering and website development. I am currently looking for a job that is particularly relevant to my experience and expertise.

As a fresh graduate, I would be honored to gain more experiences in your company as it would help me to grow in this field.

Services

Game Developer

Creates interactive and immersive games for various platforms using programming, design, and animation skills to deliver engaging player experiences.

Mobile Developer

Builds and optimizes mobile applications for Android and iOS devices, ensuring smooth functionality, user-friendly interfaces, and responsive performance.

Web Developer

Designs and develops websites and web applications with clean, functional code and visually appealing layouts tailored to user needs and modern standards.

Software Developer

Develops, tests, and maintains custom software solutions to solve specific business problems, enhance productivity, or automate processes.

3D Animation

Produces high-quality 3D animations for games, films, and promotional content, bringing characters, environments, and stories to life with visual realism.
